proj78.xml.serializer2
Class XmlSerializer

java.lang.Object
  proj78.xml.serializer2.XmlSerializer

public class XmlSerializer
extends java.lang.Object

Serializes DOM nodes to their textual (i.e., XML) representation.

Author:
K.A., copyright (c) 2008

Constructor Detail

XmlSerializer

public XmlSerializer()
Initializes a new instance of the XmlSerializer class.

XmlSerializer

public XmlSerializer(boolean formatting)
Initializes a new instance of the XmlSerializer class.

Parameters:
formatting - a boolean value indicating whether the XML generated by this serializer is to be formatted for readability (i.e., "pretty printed").
Method Detail

serialize

public final void serialize(XmlNode node,
                            java.io.Writer out)
Serializes a node to the specified character stream.

Parameters:
node - the node to serialize.
out - a Writer object representing the character stream that the serialized representation of the node is to be written to.
Throws:
XmlException - NOT_SUPPORTED_ERR: if the node could not be serialized (i.e., serialization of the specified type of node is not supported).
FILE_IO_ERR: if an I/O error occurs writing to the specified character stream.

serialize

public final void serialize(XmlNode node,
                            java.io.OutputStream out)
Serializes a node to the specified byte stream.

Parameters:
node - the node to serialize.
out - an OutputStream object representing the byte stream that the serialized representation of the node is to be written to.
Throws:
XmlException - NOT_SUPPORTED_ERR: if the node could not be serialized (i.e., serialization of the specified type of node is not supported).
FILE_IO_ERR: if an I/O error occurs writing to the specified byte stream.
